item.title: Looking to start development team
item.dc:creator: @MVH MVH-_-
item.description:
@MVH wrote:

Hey guys, I’m back and now have my bs in Java Programming !!! anyway, I’m looking to start a team for 100% G/E on 317.
I have already written fully fuctional code on figmentscape base for G/E.
I am looking for 2 to 3 more people to work on this project with me.
Requirements:

  1. Interface specialist.
  2. PHP/Web specialist.

If you meet either of the requirements and are interested in joining this team then great!

Here is what i’m looking to do… Have a programmer thats good with interfaces create + addin all interfaces for G/E. Then I will implement the code for the G/E. The PHP is not a required slot I would just like to implement some sort of G/E over web also.

Just to show you a little piece of what I already have here you go:

[code]private BufferedWriter grandExchangeBufferedWriter;
private File grandExchangeCharacterFileEditor;
private File grandExchangeItemFile;
private FileReader grandExchangeFileReader;
private int grandExchangeItemPrice;
private int grandExchangeTempItemPrice;
private String[] grandExchangeData;
private String[] grandExchangeFiles;
private String grandExchangeItemsSeller;
private String grandExchangeTextLine;

public void grandExchange(int Item) {

grandExchangeItemFile = new File("./Grand Exchange/" + Item + ".txt");

if(grandExchangeItemFile.exists()) {

    grandExchangeFileReader = new FileReader(grandExchangeItemFile);
    grandExchangeBufferedReader = new BufferedReader(grandExchangeFileReader);
grandExchangeTextLine = grandExchangeBufferedReader.readLine();
grandExchangeItemPrice = 999999999;

while(grandExchangeItemFileEnd != true) {

    grandExchangeData = grandExchangeTextLine.split("/");
    grandExchangeTempItemPrice = Integer.parseInt(grandExchangeData[0].trim());

    if(grandExchangeTempItemPrice < grandExchangeItemPrice) {
	
	grandExchangeItemPrice = grandExchangeTempItemPrice;
	grandExchangeItemsSeller = grandExchangeData[1].trim();

    }

}

grandExchangeBufferedReader.close();
grandExchangeFileReader.close();

}

}[/code]

Read full topic
